mapper.select: select w.object_id, wa_m.number manager_id, w.left, w.right, w.level, wa_c.date registration_date from worker w left join worker_attribute wa_m on wa_m.domain_id = w.id and wa_m.entity_attribute_id = 17 and wa_m.status = 1 left join worker_attribute wa_c on wa_c.domain_id = w.id and wa_c.entity_attribute_id = 14 and wa_c.status = 1 where w.status = 1
